description:
Upon entering the Annakonna Gate, Tama-Q reunites with his girlfriend causing an internal conflict regarding loyalty, while Don Harmage enforces harsher consequences upon Da Cider and Lesqua, leading to a truly epic confrontation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s the Greatest! Tama-Q, This is Love!
Saikou da myaa! Tama-Q... Sono Ai
最高だミャー! タマQ... その愛
